sides.name: Fries
sides.description: Home cut fries cooked to perfection

sides.name: Mac and Cheese
sides.description: The finest noodles and cheese combined to make heaven in a bowl

desserts.name: Pure Unfiltered Evil
desserts.description: Our mad scientists in the McSonic laboratories have come up with this diabolical creation. It's a mixed bowl filled with M&Ms and Skittles. We don't know (and don't care) how much of either is in the bowl. Just that there's both. Enjoy.

desserts.name: Your Words
desserts.description: Send us a copy of what someone in your party said, and we'll make them eat their words.

desserts.name: Foie Gras Just Desserts
desserts.description: We force feed you a third of your body weight in grains. Hope you had a light meal!

desserts.name: Broken Cookie Platter
desserts.description: This would be a normal cookie platter, but the cookies kept on breaking. Instead of wasting about 30 cookies per platter, we decided to include the broken cookies.
